# DateTimeExtensions.TimePartOnly method

Returns only time part of target DateTime.

```csharp
public static string TimePartOnly(this DateTime target)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| target | target datetime |

## Return Value

Returns only time part of target datetime
